snippet.title: Manchester United joins Twitter as @ManUtd
snippet.description: The Premier League champsions' account promises behind-the-scenes news and photos, and has racked up over 100,000 followers in a few hours.

snippet.title: Manchester United discovers...Pointcast???
snippet.description: Manchester United is discovering the desktop...while everyone else has discovered the web.

snippet.title: Football Manager 2013 (PC)
snippet.description: A host of significant additions make this the most exhaustive, but also the most streamlined, Football Manager to date.

snippet.title: Sky 3D launches pub finder: Where will you watch Manchester United vs Chelsea?
snippet.description: Sky has launched an online service to help you find the nearest pub showing this weekend's top-of-the-table Manchester Utd vs Chelsea clash in 3D

snippet.title: Adidas puts HD cameras in a World Cup football
snippet.description: The Adidas Brazucam is a World Cup football packed with cameras, putting you in the centre of a kickabout with the world's biggest soccer stars.

snippet.title: Get your TV (and other devices) football-ready
snippet.description: With the annual Big Game coming up, now's the time to make sure your TV is set up perfectly. Here are CNET's best tips for making sure your living room is ready for some football.

snippet.title: Apple devices said to get free in-flight movies on United
snippet.description: The airlines is reportedly getting ready to debut an Apple-only entertainment service that will let users access more than 150 movies and 200 TV shows while up in the air.

snippet.title: FIFA Soccer 13 (iOS)
snippet.description: If you want a great soccer game for iOS, FIFA 13 hits the mark on almost every level. With tons of teams, new skill moves, and online multiplayer, this is the sports game to beat on iOS.

snippet.title: Latest NSA abuse allegation: Spying on the United Nations
snippet.description: The new revelation comes as the NSA also cops to acknowledging that some of its analysts have snooped on e-mails of ex-lovers.
